entry.title: Monday: Clear. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
